scripts.compile-ts: cd src; find . -name "*.ts" | xargs ../node_modules/.bin/tsc --module commonjs; cd ..
scripts.bundle-spectator: cd src/poker/spectator; ../../../node_modules/.bin/browserify -t reactify main.js -o static/js/main.js; cd ../../..
scripts.make: npm run-script compile-ts && npm run-script bundle-spectator
